pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read, Manipulate and Visualize 'Pairwise mApping Format' Data // Provides functions to read, process and visualize pairwise sequence alignments in the 'PAF' format used by 'minimap2' and other whole-genome aligners. 'minimap2' is described by Li H. (2018) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bty191.
